actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution asking the President of the United States to declare Sunday, November 25, 1973, "MIA Awareness Day" to pay tribute to members of the Armed Forces who are missing in action in Indochina.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to declare Sunday, November 25, 1973, as "MIA Awareness Day" to pay tribute to members of the Armed Forces who are missing in action in Indochina.

titles.title: Joint resolution asking the President of the United States to declare Sunday, November 25, 1973, "MIA Awareness Day" to pay tribute to members of the Armed Forces who are missing in action in Indochina.
